name: stash basket
notes:
this stash basket is a great pattern for newer crocheters, and worked in simple double crochet with a large but firm hook, you will have yourself a sturdy basket in no time!

our basket is written for two sizes, but it is very easy to customize. play around with colour combinations, change colours as you go for a fade, or change the size by altering the number of repeats on the base or sides - it is a very flexible pattern!


**size:** small basket (large basket)
**dimensions:** base x height 14cm x 12.5cm (18cm x 17cm)
**yarn:** fibra natura cottonwood (105m/50g) or any 8ply/dk weight yarn. please note that yarn is held double throughout
**quantity:**	1 (2) balls each in two colours.
**hook:** 5mm 
**gauge:** 14.5 sts and 16 rows to 10cm in double crochet. gauge is not critical for this project, but the firmer your fabric, the better it will stand up!
**materials:** stitch marker, yarn needle

**notes:** 
* this pattern is written using uk crochet terminology
* yarn is held double throughout. you can hold the same two together throughout, or change colours as you go to create a fade!
